games.title: Disco Elysium - The Final Cut
games.descr: Disco Elysium - The Final Cut is the definitive edition of the smash-hit RPG. Pursue your political dreams in new quests, meet and question more of the city's locals, and explore a whole extra area.

games.title: Half-Life 2
games.descr: HALF-LIFE sends a shock through the game industry with its combination of pounding action and continuous, immersive storytelling.

games.title: Grand Theft Auto V
games.descr: Microsoft no longer supports creating Games for Windows-LIVE accounts within Grand Theft Auto IV.

games.title: Total War
games.descr: It still has the epic, dense campaigns fans of the series are looking for, but the way it makes diplomacy completely transparent, telling you exactly what it will take to strike a deal, makes dealing with other factions more streamlined.

games.title: Doom
games.descr: Fights are still, for the most part, unbearably tense and hectic. You’ll scramble and double jump to avoid packs of enemies, using the super shotgun’s meat hook to grapple to far-off enemies before turning them into red mist..

games.title: Madden NFL 22
games.descr: Fast to the fun, social football gameplay with NFL superstars set in locations around the globe featuring larger than life presentation, characters and teams.

games.title: Mass Effect Legendary Edition
games.descr: The Mass Effect Legendary Edition includes single-player base content and over 40 DLC from the highly acclaimed Mass Effect, Mass Effect 2, and Mass Effect 3 games, including promo weapons, armors, and packs – remastered and optimized for 4K Ultra HD.

games.title: NBA 2K22 75th Anniversary Edition
games.descr: This edition also includes NBA 2K22 for Xbox Series X|S - A New Generation NBA 2K Experience. NBA 2K22 puts the entire basketball universe in your hands. Anyone, anywhere can hoop in NBA 2K22.

games.title: Quantum Break
games.descr: It might've overextended a bit with its experimental TV tie-in elements, but Quantum Break from Remedy Entertainment (makers of Max Payne and Alan Wake) has moments where its mix of third-person shooting and temporal powers really soars.

games.title: Halo
games.descr: No, the main draw here is the chance to play through four of the Xbox's most formative games in their best possible versions - the early games are remade with improved graphics, there are frame rate boosts, re-done hi-res cutscenes and more.

games.title: Red Dead Redemption 2
games.descr: Winner of over 175 Game of the Year Awards and recipient of over 250 perfect scores, RDR2 is the epic tale of outlaw Arthur Morgan and the infamous Van der Linde gang, on the run across America at the dawn of the modern age.

games.title: Shadow of the Colossus
games.descr: Shadow of the Colossus is one of those games that everyone wanted to be remastered for years upon years. And then it happened.
